mireka.destination
Interface MailDestination

All Superinterfaces:
Destination, ResponsibleDestination
All Known Implementing Classes:
ForwardDestination, ListDestination, MaildropDestination, NullDestination, TransformDestination, TransmitterDestination
public interface MailDestination
extends ResponsibleDestination

MailDestination is a ResponsibleDestination which is able to deliver the complete mail at the end of an SMTP mail transaction.

Method Summary
 void data(Mail mail)
          Processes the mail.

data

          throws RejectExceptionExt
Processes the mail. This function is called after the SMTP DATA command has been received.
